task.title: Generate Word Counts and Segment Statistics

context.p: XLIFF Manager lets you produce an HTML file with word counts and segment status statistics from an XLIFF document.

step.cmd: Type the name and location of the XLIFF file to analyse in the XLIFF File text box in the Translation Status Analysis section or click the Browse... button next to it to select an XLIFF file from the file system.

step.stepresult: XLIFF Manager will generate an HTML report in the folder where the XLIFF file is located and its name will be the name of the XLIFF plus .log.html.
